DOC.brief_title: A Study Intratumoral IMO-2125 Patients With Refractory Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients must histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis cancer amenable curative therapy . Patients diagnosis PD ( L ) 1 inhibitor FDA approve must previously receive treatment one therapy . Patients must disease measurable RECIST v1.1 least 2 tumor accessible biopsy . Patients must 18 year age old . Patients must ECOG Performance Status ≤2 . Patients must meet follow laboratory criterion : 1 . ANC ≥1.5 x 109/L ( ≥1500/mm3 ) 2 . Platelet count ≥100 x 109/L ( ≥100,000/mm3 ) 3 . Hemoglobin ≥8.0 g/dL ( ≥4.96 mmol/L ) 4 . Serum creatinine ≤1.5 x ULN 24hour creatinine clearance ≥60 mL/minute 5 . AST ≤2.5 x ULN ; ALT ≤2.5 x ULN AST/ALT < 5 x ULN liver involvement 6 . Serum bilirubin ≤1.5 x ULN , except patient Gilbert 's Syndrome must total bilirubin < 3 mg/dL ( 51.3 μmol/L ) Patients receive prior therapy TLR agonist ( prior treatment topical TLR agonist ( e.g . imiquimod ) permit ) . Patients receive treatment IFNα within previous 6 month prior enrollment . Patients know hypersensitivity oligodeoxynucleotide adequately manage appropriate prophylaxis . Patients active autoimmune disease require diseasemodifying therapy . Patients require concurrent systemic steroid therapy high physiologic dosage ( 7.5 mg/day prednisone equivalent ) . Patients another primary malignancy remission least 3 year . The following exempt 3year limit : nonmelanoma skin cancer , curatively treat localized prostate cancer nondetectable prostatespecific antigen , cervical carcinoma situ biopsy squamous intraepithelial lesion Papanicolaou ( Pap ) smear , thyroid cancer ( except anaplastic ) . Patients active infection require systemic treatment . Patients know hepatitis B surface antigen positive . Patients know diagnosis human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . Women pregnant breastfeeding . Patients known central nervous system , meningeal , epidural disease . Patients stable brain metastasis follow definitive local treatment eligible steroid requirement < 7.5 mg/day prednisone ( equivalent ) . Patients impaired cardiac function clinically significant cardiac disease .
